import { Component, OnInit, ViewEncapsulation } from '@angular/core'; import { PRODUCT } from '../../../../shared/data/tables/product-list'; @Component({ selector: 'app-product-list', templateUrl: './product-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product-list.component.scss'], encapsulation: ViewEncapsulation.None }) export class ProductListComponent implements OnInit { public products = PRODUCT; constructor() { // this.products = productDB.product; } ngOnInit() { } }
